**(11 Fields, 8 Collected, Delimited)**

**Target Table: `INCIDENT_OFFNDR_DSPLNRY_ACTION`**

| **Load Sequence/Dependencies** |
|--------------------------------|
| PERSON                         |
| INCIDENT OFFENDER              |

## Template Description
This template is used to track disciplinary sanctions as well as referral to or participation in remedial programs. Each known offender should have one and only one sanction record in this template identifying the "highest" or most severe sanction (Disciplinary Action Code between `S1` and `S10`). If referred to or participating in remedial programs the offender also will have one or multiple additional records in this template with the Disciplinary Action Code between `R1` and `R9`.

## Template Specifications {#template-specs}

---
### 1 - SUBMITTING AUN
<p><Badge color="required" /> <Badge color="key" /> <Badge length={9} /></p>

The unique, 9-digit AUN assigned by the PDE.

<details open>
<summary>**Sample / Valid Value:**</summary>

All LEA and School Numbers can be found on the [EdNA website](http://www.edna.pa.gov/Screens/wfHome.aspx).

`123456789`
</details>

**eScholar Name**: `SUBMITTING DISTRICT CODE`

---
### 2 - INCIDENT ID
<p><Badge color="required" /> <Badge color="key" /> <Badge length={30} /></p>

An identifier assigned by the LEA to the incident; this identifier must be unique within each LEA per school year.

<details open>
<summary>**Sample / Valid Value:**</summary>

`9801`
</details>

---
### 3 - OFFENDER ID
<p><Badge color="required" /> <Badge color="key" /> <Badge length={20} /></p>

An identifier for the offender involved in an incident.

:::warning[Business Rules:]
Must be the same value used in Field 2 - [PERSON ID](docs/templates/discipline/person.mdx#2---person-id) within the Person Template.
:::

<details open>
<summary>**Sample / Valid Value:**</summary>

`887`
</details>

---
### 4 - DISCIPLINARY ACTION CODE
<p><Badge color="required" /> <Badge color="key" /> <Badge length={3} /></p>

The code of the sanction taken against the offender for the incident or the remedial program the offender has been referred to or is participating in.

<details open>
<summary>**Sample / Valid Value:**</summary>

See [Appendix AN](docs/appendix/appendix-AN.mdx) for a complete list of valid values.
</details>

---
### 5 - SCHOOL YEAR DATE
<p><Badge color="required" /> <Badge color="key" /> <Badge length={10} /></p>

A single date (June 30), the last day of the current school year indicating the whole school year.

<details open>
<summary>**Sample / Valid Value:**</summary>

`2024-06-30`
</details>

---
### 6-7
Fields not collected. Must be delimited in template file.

---
### 8 - ORIGINAL DISCIPLINARY ACTION DURATION
<p><Badge color="conditional" /> <Badge color="updateable" /> <Badge length={6} /></p>

The number of school days the student was suspended, expelled, or removed to an interim alternative education setting for the incident.

- If the duration extends beyond the last day of the school term, report only the number of days up to and including the last day of the school term.
- If the entire duration of a disciplinary action `S3`- `S9` is to be served in the following school year:
   - Leave blank
   - Report `S10` (other)
   - Describe the actual disciplinary action and duration in Field 11 [DISCPILINARY ACTION COMMENT](#11---disciplinary-action-comment).

:::warning[Business Rules:]
Required if [Field 4 (DISCIPLINARY ACTION CODE)](#4---disciplinary-action-code) = `S3` â€“ `S9`.
:::

<details open>
<summary>**Sample / Valid Value:**</summary>

`5`
</details>

---
### 9
Field not collected. Must be delimited in template file.

---
### 10 - RECEIVED SERVICES INDICATOR
<p><Badge color="conditional" /> <Badge color="updateable" /> <Badge length={1} /></p>

Indicator of whether the student received educational services during expulsion.

:::warning[Business Rules:]
Required if Field 4 [DISCIPLINARY ACTION CODE](#4---disciplinary-action-code) = `S5`, `S6`, or `S7`
:::

<details open>
<summary>**Sample / Valid Value:**</summary>

- `Y`
- `N`
</details>

---
### 11 - DISCIPLINARY ACTION COMMENT
<p><Badge color="conditional" /> <Badge color="updateable" /> <Badge length={500} /></p>

A comment on the disciplinary sanction or remedial program.

:::warning[Business Rules:] 
Required if [Field 4 (DISCIPLINARY ACTION CODE)](#4---disciplinary-action-code) = `S10`, `R9`, or if incident involved a firearm and student was not expelled.
:::

<details open>
<summary>**Sample / Valid Value:**</summary>

`Student lost athletic privileges.`
</details>

---
